column5: Question? Why not fish the US side of LOTW? Any benefit to either side?

Except for the NW Angle, the US side is open, big water. Canadian side is the typical shield experience with more structure. Need a bigger boat to fish out of Baudette, and if you're a muskie guy you will fish out of the Angle or one of the Canadian ports, eh?
So the protection from the islands is basically the only difference?
